channel.title: Make staffs stand straight
channel.description:
Well, I'm currently coding a new server from scratch (no source) and I've finished wielding items. Now I know you change the run animation and other things for weapons like the whip, and standing animations for two-handers, etc. :) But I know some servers have straight standing staffs, so I downloaded one and can't seem to find what makes the staffs stand straight. :confused:
Even though I'm not using a source, post any links or instructions anyway, I can re-write it for my server. ;)

item.title: Make staffs stand straight
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Thanks souljah, thats just what I needed.

And yes this isn’t a WinterLove source its from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Make staffs stand straight
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

edit for the guy few posts down - this is the code that holds my staffs/weapons up right might help you might not. sorry for not reading the Entire post was in a rush.





         		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) { // Dragon Halberd
            			playerSE = 809;
            			playerSEA = 1665;
            			playerSEW = 1146;
            			playerSER = 1210;
            		}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) { // Dragon Longsword
            			playerSE = 809;
				playerSEA = 1058;
            		}
			if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419) { //Scythe
				playerSEA = 408;
			}
         		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153) { // Granite Maul
            			playerSE = 1662;
            			playerSEA = 1665;
            			playerSEW = 1663;
            			playerSER = 1664;
            		}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) { // Ancient staff

				playerSEA = 806;

item.title: Make staffs stand straight
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:3, topic:175993”]i think your looking or this?
heres the emote 809[/quote]

Yep thats the ticket. Thank you very much![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2008, 08:18:00 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know the emote ID for when your walking and running to make the staff stand straight?
